alert.note: Alert for Moultrie (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 6:55PM CDT until April 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN MOULTRIE...SOUTHERN PIATT AND SOUTHEASTERN MACON COUNTIES... At 655 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cerro Gordo to near Macon, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Cerro Gordo around 700 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Monticello, Hammond and Bement. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 148 and 150. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
